mapper.select: SELECT re.rvid, it.itemid, cu.custid, re.rvtxt, re.rvdate FROM review re INNER JOIN item it ON re.itemid = it.itemid INNER JOIN cust cu ON re.custid = cu.custid WHERE rvid = #{rvid}
